com.insofar.actor
Class ActorPlugin

java.lang.Object
  org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
      com.insofar.actor.ActorPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin
public class ActorPlugin
extends org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin

Actor Plugin for recording and playback of character actions and movement.

Author:
Joshua Weinberg

authors

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Author> authors
Authors by username. An author is the player recording the actors.

actors

public java.util.ArrayList<EntityActor> actors
Actors - this is only for use of the bukkit commands in this plugin. When using this plugin puely as a library you need to keep track of your own actors.
